headline: Holiday Shortcuts Open the Door to Scams, Norton Warns
summary: Holiday shortcuts are putting shoppers in scammers' crosshairs. According to the 2025 Norton Cyber Safety Insights Report: Holiday shopping, money-saving shortcuts, urgency-driven decisions, and overconfidence online are leaving millions vulnerable. Despite concern over AI-powered scams and shady sellers, nearly two-thirds (62%) of Americans say they're likely to jump on a holiday deal the moment they see it, and often without vetting the source.
